jobs.description: Job Description  We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Software Engineer to join our team. The successful candidate will have at least 4 years of experience in web and mobile application development using MERN stack and React Native. Experience in Azure will be a great bonus. The Senior Software Engineer will be responsible for leading and managing the team's quality and timeline for all our projects, assisting in hiring, speeding up our development process, ensuring all team members do clean coding and follow company coding standards which are set up by themselves, and providing timely reports on teamwork progress.  Responsibilities    Lead and manage the team's quality and timeline for all our projects   Assist in hiring, training, and mentoring software engineers   Develop high-quality web and mobile applications using MERN stack and React Native   Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including project managers, UI/UX designers, and QA testers, to ensure project success   Ensure all team members do clean coding and follow company coding standards which are set up by themselves   Speed up the development process by optimizing code and using the latest development tools and methodologies   Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues that arise during the development lifecycle   Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in software engineering   Provide timely reports on teamwork progress to the project manager   Requirements    Bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science or a related field   Minimum 4 years of experience in web and mobile application development using MERN stack and React Native   Strong knowledge of cloud services, preferably Azure   Proven experience in leading and managing software development projects   Strong knowledge of software development methodologies, tools, and processes   Excellent communication and interpersonal skills   Strong problem-solving and analytical skills   Ability to work well in a team environment   Ability to multitask and prioritise tasks effectively

Incube8 is seeking a passionate Senior Software Engineer role specialising in React development, interested in building high-performance and scalable applications to handle millions of users. Your main responsibility is to maintain a social media web application with an emphasis on scale and performance. You will collaborate with the UI/UX designers, backend developers, other front-end developers, and the business to design and implement new and exciting features. You will also be involved in reviewing other engineers’ code to maintain and improve code quality. This is an opportunity to join a successful software company offering the chance to work on interesting and varied cross-platform projects using the latest development technologies.  Requirements    MUST HAVE: At least 5 years experience building and maintaining high traffic, socially interactive web applications built with React, and 10 years as a software engineer (Please do not apply if you do not meet this requirement.)   Previous Lead Front-End React Developer experience across multiple teams   Experience working with PWA, NextJs, Redux, React Router and ES6 features   Experience with Responsive Web Design (mobile first)   Experience with web applications with real-time data from chat, image and video   Experienced with micro frontend development   Solid understanding of the Typescript, CSS3, HTML5, SASS, Git   Portfolio of past projects written in React   Familiar with Front-end modern toolchains (Webpack, Babel, Vite, …) or similar ones   Familiar with Agile/Scrum methodology understanding

Job Description - Lead generation to gain new/potential projects. - Supporting clients on existing projects - Writing quotations - Liaising with clients and collaborating with different internal departments - Conducting training sessions to client - Supporting partners on site  Job Requirements - Able to work in fast-paced environment - Possess good interpersonal skills - Good communication and writing skills - Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, PowerPoint, Excel) - Basic data skills - Good organization and management skill

Responsibilities:    Performs software development and verification and ensure the implementation and completion of the system requirements, aligned with the given timelines. Works with interdisciplinary teams to achieve the project goals.   Perform extensive software and system testing in customer’s location for a duration of time.   Ensures that the requirements are implemented accurately, following given coding rules and guidelines. Ensure product quality with accurate unit-tests and realization within the given product architecture and coding standard.   Builds and maintains appropriate user documentation for the implementation. Comply and enforce to the company software Quality Management System and Safety requirements   Requirements:    Bachelor’s degree in software engineering, computer science\engineering, Engineering, Physics, Mathematics, or equivalent.   Strong programming skills in C, C++, C#, .NET architecture and MS Visual Studio.   At least 2 years of software development experience   Experience in software testing will be an added advantage.   Knowledge of software development lifecycle processes, methodologies, and software test methodologies

Responsibilities ● Develop the beta version of our computer vision software by working closely with a small team including data scientists and software developers from diverse backgrounds. ● Develop backend computer vision modules based on physiological/behavioral baselines and deviations. ● Work with video/imaging data to develop and train Machine Learning models. ● Ensure algorithms are robust and work with a wide variety of subjects. ● Read papers to find latest work on CV for estimating human physiological responses ● Provide assistance on technical documentation, paper publishing and patent filing

Job Description:   · Development of computer control and communication software to operate devices and sensors.   · Programming of hardware control and HMI using various programming languages, software testing and system tuning.  Job Requirements:   · A degree or Diploma in relevant engineering disciplines, including but not limited to: computer engineering, electrical/electronic engineering, mechanical engineering, mechatronics, computer science/engineering, and information engineering.   · Specialization in automation/ mechanical/ computer control/ electro-mechanical with relevant industrial experience.   · Programming experience in C# or C++, or Python using VS studio and VS Code, for sensor or digital IO communication and control, and data acquisition.   · Learn new programming languages from time to time as required   · Familiar with RS 232/485 serial communications and Modbus TCP/IP communications, servo and stepping motor control is a bonus.   · Must be able to read write and speak Mandarin Chinese(to liaise with Chinese-speaking clients).

Job Description:   · Development of computer control and communication software to operate devices and sensors.   · Programming of hardware control and HMI using various programming languages, software testing and system tuning.  Job Requirements:   · A degree or Diploma in relevant engineering disciplines, including but not limited to: computer engineering, electrical/electronic engineering, mechanical engineering, mechatronics, computer science/engineering, and information engineering.   · Specialization in automation/ mechanical/ computer control/ electro-mechanical with relevant industrial experience.   · Programming experience in C# or C++, or Python using VS studio and VS Code, for sensor or digital IO communication and control, and data acquisition.   · Learn new programming languages from time to time as required   · Familiar with RS 232/485 serial communications and Modbus TCP/IP communications, servo and stepping motor control is a bonus.   · Must be able to read write and speak Mandarin Chinese(to liaise with Chinese-speaking clients).

Squarepoint is a global investment management firm that utilizes a diversified portfolio of systematic and quantitative strategies across financial markets that seeks to achieve high quality, uncorrelated returns for our clients. We have deep expertise in trading, technology and operations and attribute our success to rigorous scientific research. As a technology and data-driven firm, we design and build our own cutting-edge systems, from high performance trading platforms to large scale data analysis and compute farms. With main investment offices in New York, London and Singapore, we emphasize true, global collaboration by aligning our investment, technology and operations teams functionally around the world.  Group            Algorithmic Trading Framework Position         Software Developer Main Function    We are looking for smart and problem-solver people who are passionate about technology and enjoy working on complex problems.   The role will involve developing and maintaining the algorithmic trading framework and other applications used by the trading desk.   The developer will be expected to follow the software development life-cycle (requirements analysis, design, development, testing and deployment) and will work in a global environment.  Responsibilities:    Design, develop and test real-time mission critical software for algorithmic trading.   Collaborate closely with quant researchers and peers in technology to ensure global consistency and maximize re-use of software components.   Work with technology operations to provide 2nd/3rd level application support as required.  Candidate Requirements Qualifications:    Bachelor’s Degree required with a strong computer science/ computer engineering background   5+ years C++ development experience on Linux (C++11, C++14)   Superior analytical and problem-solving skills   Strong interpersonal and communication skills   Strong experience designing and developing highly reliable and scalable multi-threaded and complex event processing architectures   Experience with regression/unit/integration testing  Desirable Qualifications:    Understanding of order management, exchange connectivity or market data handling for Equities, FX or fixed income products.   Understanding of Equity, FX, fixed income or other asset classes.   Experience developing large-scale concurrent, event-driven systems.   Experience mentoring developers

Job Description:    Participate in the end-to-end life cycle of the production of software and applications (from ideation to delivery and maintenance)   Design technical solutions with our users in mind and collaborate with the full team to implement, test,      and evaluate those solutions.   Deliver high quality code in a highly collaborative, fast paced and iterative environment.   Be hands-on and deliver on frontend applications and backend platform services.   Build and operate infrastructure, toolset and CI/CD pipelines.   Develop individually to continue to grow and provide training to individuals and other functional groups as      needed.   Continuously improve digital solutions by innovating on the services offered.   Skills and Experience:    2+ years of experience in software engineering   Interested in working on front end and backend services.   Detail oriented, organized and diligent with ability to prioritize and execute on multiple tasks   Experienced running software in DevOps environments..   Experience with cloud infrastructure deployments (AWS, Azure, GCP)  Technologies you’ll work with:    TypeScript, Node.js, PHP      Laravel, Google Apps Scripting, Java, Pyhton, etc   HTML, CSS Bootstrap, Jquery   Google Cloud, Ubuntu, iOS,      Android, AWS, Linux (Nginx)   MSSQL, MySQL, MongoDB   React-Native, ReactJS,      Wordpress, Angular, Vue   GitHub

Responsibilities:    Design, develop and test mobile applications for the iOS ; Android platform   Participate in full mobile application development life cycle   Works to keep informed on the latest trends, technologies and best practices in mobile software development   Write clean, high-quality, high-performance, maintainable code   Works on project teams or individually, to develop mobile applications   Follows best practices related to development, testing and change management procedures   Works with project stakeholders to develop an enhanced user experience   Ensure codes are in compliance to standards   Set, maintain and increase standards for development to reduce complexity   Ability to architect medium to large scale systems   Undertake any ad-hoc duties assigned by superior  Requirements:    Min Degree / Diploma in Information Technology or qualifications in similar discipline preferably with at least 3 year's working experience in similar capacity   Familiar with NoSQL and/or cloud database (Cloud Firestore or MongoDB)   Excellent understanding of the full mobile development life cycle (iOS, Android ; Hybrid Application)   Strong OOP and design knowledge for creating extensible, re-usable software   Experience with Flutter, and cloud services such as AWS/GCP   Ability to work independently, self-motivated and result oriented   Willingness to build peer relationships and to work in a team environment   Good analytical and problem solving skills   Entry-level candidates with excellent learning attitude are welcome to apply   In depth knowledge of Java, PHP, HTML5, MySQL, MSSQL, Android SDK, Android NDK, Javascript, Objective-C, SWIFT, React Native with Redux concept   Familiar with Cross-Platform Development, UI/UX Design Skills   Experience with Web Services (REST/SOAP), Multimedia Content Development   Experience between managing and switching between Dev and Dev/Ops environments   Experience working on third-party libraries and APIs   Knowledge in data gathering, manipulation and analysis   Knowledge in designing and building scalable application (e.g. Elasticsearch)   Excellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude  * Please include detailed past working experiences in point form in your updated resume.

We are looking for a first line support engineer to design, implement ; maintain and support our growing business. Not only providing basic technical support but also assist for application development/enhancement on existing systems or BI reports based on user requirements as well as assist to maintain overall IT network infrastructure. Job Duties:    IT support for 5 Physical locations in Singapore (Occasional travel between offices) and remote support for APAC countries including Australia, PH, and MY.   Modifying software to fix errors, adapt it to new hardware, improve its performance, or upgrade interfaces.   Directing system testing and validation procedures.   Assist to develop BI reports by using company specify BI tool for supporting business.   Installing and configuring computer hardware, software, systems, networks, printers, and scanners.   Troubleshoot and resolve issues with software or hardware.   Work experience in an IT environment supporting desktops, laptops, peripherals, and printers.   Work experience in a service/help desk setting.  Job Requirements:    Diploma or degree in computer science or related fields   Minimum 3 years of experience as a software engineer or system operator   Outstanding all-round communication skills and ability to work collaboratively   Perform network maintenance and system upgrades including service packs, patches, hot fixes and security configurations   Monitor performance and ensure system availability and reliability   Hands-on experience with monitoring, network diagnostic and network analytics tools   SAP-ABAP or Power BI (DAX) related know-how is a plus in order to support business related reporting requirements   Proven hands-on network engineering experience   Understanding of networking protocols (e.g., IPSEC, HSRP, OSPF, QoS, SD WAN)   Understanding of the TCP/IP model   Programming language include but not limited to : Python, DAX, Java, ABAP

Since 1997, Zenith Infotech has been supporting our clients from government ; corporates for their tech recruitment needs.   Currently one of our clients from the Air ; Land Transport domain is looking out for Devops or Site Reliability Engineer to support their In-Flight Entertainment projects.   Responsibilities: As a Software/DevOps Engineer, you will build our digital product and services that power our client's  Airline customers, and continuously improve engineering practices. You will design, implement and deploy applications and backend business services that will empower passenger experience for Airline customers and build data analytical solutions for better monitoring and reporting capabilities for operational support teams. You will be an individual contributor in a high visibility role, positioning you to deliver high impact at our client's IFE Digital Engineering team and challenging you with learning opportunities that will help you grow and accelerate your career.     Design, develop and deploy IFE digital solutions with focus on high availability and scalability.   Drive collaboration within Agile teams of Engineers and Product Owners and UI Designers to build new product features   Collaborate closely with squad engineers and become a valued member of an autonomous, cross- functional squad.   Collaboration with Cloud CoE team to improve the tooling, develop a safe, secure framework for fast deployment of Inflyt Experience digital solutions.   Be hands-on and deliver on frontend applications and backend platform services.   Build and operate infrastructure, toolset and CI/CD pipelines.   Develop individually to continue to grow and provide training to individuals and other functional groups as needed   Continuously improve IFE digital solutions by innovating on the services offered.   Requirements: Education and Experience    Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science or any relevant field   Minimum 2 years of software development experience   Experience in web/mobile application development, networking or systems software development.   Experience with cloud platforms, Docker, CI tools, and configuration management tools.   Experience working with virtualization and clustered orchestration (Kubernetes).   Experience with infrastructure provisioning tools (Terraform).   Experience in Java, C/C++, C#, Python, JavaScript, NodeJs or Golang.

Broad understanding of computer science, with specific knowledge of computer programming, application design, and user-focused features   Creative problem solvers   Good interpersonal, communication, and organizational skills   Good team players and maintain the integrity and display good attention to detail   Ability to understand and analyze complex systems   Proficient in writing software using the Java Programming Language and a standard object library   Sound knowledge of software development process   Familiarity with agile development such as Scrum   Knowledge of software integrated development environments   Extensive knowledge in various programming languages (Java, Perl, Python, C++, etc.)   Demonstrated analytical, organizational, and project management skills, using relevant information to make timely and critical decisions that affect cross-functional teams   Ability to handle client and customer issues tactfully and professionally  Academic Qualifications and Certifications:    Bachelor's degree in computer science or software engineering   Relevant certifications  Required Experience:    Software Applications Engineering, Software Development experience, or related work experience   Experience with Programming Languages such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.   Experienced with Linux or Unix and Windows operating systems   Experience working with SQL   Project management experience and/or experience working in an Agile environment

The Software Developer intern reports to the CTO. The internship will be project-based and presents a fast-paced environment that emphasizes quality deliverables and continuous improvement to encourage one to sharpen their expertise. We are looking for creative, hardworking, and versatile developers who can bring fresh ideas regarding the works of Convolutional Neural Networks and Deep Learning. Engage in a meaningful software developer experience in the fast-growing EduTech industry today!  Job Description Assist in the developing of our existing solutions and recommend improvements to our existing solutions    Assist in delivering quality user experience and user interface  Assist with the Analysis, Design, Development, Testing, and Documentation of new software solutions    Assist in developing proof of concepts and technical designs   Assist in data modelling   Assist in the installation and configuration of plug-ins   Assist in technical documentation   Learn to develop, customise, and integrate of Moodle, Totara, and other PHP-based web applications   Learn to manage software development, enhancement, debugging, testing, and maintenance of the backend application   Learn to make design, code, testing, and system quality improvement to backend application programming interface (API)   Job Specifications    Basic knowledge in HTML/ CSS3 with JavaScript/ JQuery, MySQL, and CakePHP   Passion for IT and software development   Willingness to learn on the job   Able to work in a team who enjoys interaction at work and during recreation   Currently pursuing diploma in Computer Science, Information Technology, Information Systems, or equivalent  Benefits    Internship that is more than 3 months will entitle to 1 AL from 4th month onwards.

Job Title: Senior Software Engineer (ID1400) Location: Customer Site Working Hours: Mon to Fri 9am to 6pm Salary: $7000 to $8000   Job Summary The candidate will play a key role in building a strong software engineers team and later leading this team in providing architectural development and implementation of complex, multi-tiered, and distributed software applications using DLT and blockchain technology.   Job Description • Hands-on development work (and lead a team of software engineers in delivering applications (50%) • Training, mentoring, and providing subject matter expertise to colleagues and business partners who will be collaborating with the company (30%) • Production support (Level-2 and Level-3) (20%)   Requirements: • Possess an Engineering related bachelor or post-graduate degree • Developer/architect with 7+ years of relevant experience • Experience with leading a team of software engineers in developing large scale distributed applications • Understanding of application and infrastructure architecture, both functional and non-functional aspects • Possess advanced knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming and Design. • Very good leadership skills with the ability to lead multiple development teams. • Thorough hands-on experience in working with AWS, Google Cloud or Azure cloud-based architecture and deploying web-based and web-enabled business application. • Strong technical knowledge and hands-on experience in Full Stack Development and /or DLT, Blockchain. • Good working knowledge of open source tools and technologies. • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in technical subjects • A good understanding of Software Engineering Best Practices and ability to define and drive this within the teams. • Very good understanding and experience in design and implementation of enterprise applications. • Strong communication and interpersonal skills with ability to speak to technical level staff and business executives, stakeholders • Technologies We Use : Go, Java, Javascript, Python, Linux, AWS, Github, Docker, Blockchain Technologies - Ethereum, Hyperledger Fabric

Are you a Software Test Automation Engineer with a passion for quality? We're looking for a skilled professional to be part of our R;D Software Engineering team in WS Audiology. You'll be responsible for developing and executing test plans, collaborating within an agile team and continuously improving our testing processes. The role will be located at our Singapore office at 18 Tai Seng Street.  The role     Review and analyze business and system requirements and develop various test specifications which include Functional Testing, System Integration Testing, Performance Testing and Compliance Testing   Design/ Develop, review and maintain test scenarios, test cases, test data for manual and automation tests   Perform trace analysis, execute manual and automation test   Ensure that all test activities adhere to company standards and expectations   Collaborate with a team of test engineers, subject-matter experts, stakeholders to ensure delivery of quality test artifacts   Drive continuous innovation and improvement around test processes and technical capabilities   Perform test management, test reporting and defect management for assigned projects   Provide lessons learnt based on the analysis of related test statistics collatedtime for innovation at regular intervals.  Experience     Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science or similar disciplines   Minimum 3+ years of relevant software test experience   Good understanding of Agile Software Development Lifecycle and Azure DevOps Server   Good understanding of software development or testing background knowledge   Some knowledge and hands-on experience in commonly used tools and performance load testing tools will be an added advantage   Experience with either C# or Javascript will be preferred §Prior desktop/ web/ mobile software testing experience is ideal  Who we are  At WS Audiology, we provide innovative hearing aids and hearing health services. Together with our 12,000 colleagues in 130 countries, we invite you to help unlock human potential by bringing back hearing for millions of people around the world. With us, you will become part of a truly global company where we care for one another, welcome diversity and celebrate our successes.  Sounds wonderful? We can't wait to hear from you.  WS Audiology is an equal-opportunity employer and committed to creating an inclusive employee experience for all. Regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, medical condition, ancestry, disability, military or veteran status we firmly believe that our work is at its best when everyone feels free to be their most authentic self.

About Doctor Anywhere Doctor Anywhere (DA) is on a mission to be the largest tech-enabled, omnichannel healthcare provider in Southeast Asia. First launched in Singapore in 2017, DA aims to bridge gaps in the healthcare ecosystem through developing innovative solutions and technologies. In 2021, DA raised SGD$88 million in Series C fundraising (August 2021) and acquired Doctor Raksa, the biggest telemedicine platform in Thailand which further strengthened our foundation for telehealth and healthcare offerings. Today, DA is present in Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, Indonesia and India, serving more than 2.5 million (and growing) users across the region.  At DA, we believe in the value of innovation and collaboration. Grounded in our motto of “Keep Going, Keep Growing”, our team strives towards excellence every day, and values diversity in perspectives brought by every member. Together, we bring quality healthcare to your doorstep!  About the team Technology is the backbone of our business. Our engineering team consists of talented and passionate engineers who are responsible for building adaptable, reliable, scalable and secure platforms for our products and services. Working in cross functional teams, our engineers collaborate with Product, Infrastructure, Data and Security teams in delivering exceptional experiences for our customers.  About the role As a Staff Software Engineer/Solutions Architect, you will contribute in a multitude of ways, from architecting phenomenal systems, creating and encouraging good software development practices engineering-wide, driving strategic technical improvements, and mentoring other engineers to take our capabilities to the next level.  Responsibilities    Part of the team that owns the company wide technology architecture and roadmap   Collaborating with other engineers to execute the technical strategy by building high quality software that can meet the current and future needs of the business.   Drive adoption of contemporary practices, architectures, and technologies into our organization.   Evaluate and integrate 3rd party and partner solutions across regions and markets where Doctor Anywhere operates   Keep abreast of the latest technologies and develop strategies to adopt suitable and/or novel technologies  About you    At least 8 years software/product engineering experience in fast-paced environments   At least 4 years of experience in designing and implementing large scale internet based solutions   Track record of building scalable and highly available distributed systems.   Strong knowledge of trends in contemporary software engineering practices   Exceptional knowledge and awareness of end-to-end technologies required to build modern distributed software systems.   Strong knowledge and experience in at least two of the followingImplementation of services using Java, Go or NodeJS iOS , Android or hybrid mobile application development React or Angular web development Implementation of cloud deployed/cloud native (AWS, GCP) and/or container based applications   Strong communication skills with ability to work with individuals from multiple domains, from product owners to 3rd party partners   Ability to multitask and prioritize effectively in a fast paced environment

Azbil Singapore Pte Ltd, was, established since 1998, as an overseas base in Singapore with the commitment of serving our valued customers at their doorstep. Today, we are a leading solutions provider of sensors, valves, controllers, system, software and maintenance for Industrial, Factory and Building Automation industries. We are currently strengthening and expanding our operations base in Singapore and is looking for a Software Engineer for the Building Automation business to join our team. You will work closely with our Sales and Project team and involve in Design, develop, and deploy software application products of IBMS projects through requirements gathering and analyzing, planning, documenting, organizing, and managing the software development life cycle (SLDC) with internal and external teams to fulfil the customer requirements satisfactorily and meet the project timeline without any delay and defects. In additions, researching new technologies to improve performance and enhance the software products' efficiency, supporting the sales and marketing team to understand tender requirements and build POC, and supporting the maintenance team to troubleshoot and implement new functions and features to existing products.  Responsibilities:    Establishing the critical milestones with the support of the project team.   Requirement breakdown for architecting of the software products and modulizing the significant components for continuous integration and deployment.   Participating in handshake tests and site testing when necessary.   Establishing the Software Quality assurance procedure and performing T;C and user training.   Conducting sessions and workshops directly with the stakeholders to get requirements.   Arrange and plan the workforce commitment with the internal and external teams as required.   Maintaining proper communication between all the teams and the stakeholders.   Support Sales and Marketing teams to understand the tender requirements, especially for cloud-related solutions.   Observe new technologies in software development, cloud computing and project management to enhance the performance of existing software products and design new solutions for future requirements.   Build POC (Proof of Concept) solutions for demonstrations and exhibitions to get new projects.   Troubleshooting bugs of existing software products.   Establishing preventive maintenance strategies to avoid future disturbance.   Analyzing the new requirements to the existing products and planning the implementation with minimum disruption to the system.  Requirements:    Minimum Bachelor Degree related to Computer Engineering/Software Engineering/Computer Science   Certification on Software Development Methodologies   Certificate on Cloud Computing (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud etc.)   2-3 Years of Software Development Experience with latest technologies preferred   1-2 years of BMS/IBMS related Experience   1-2 Years of Cloud computing experience   2-3 Years of Software Development management experience preferred   Good verbal and writing skills in English   Having good communication skills manage conflicts between team and stakeholders.   Having good interpersonal skills, including leadership to motivate and mentor the team

Job descriptions and responsibilities: • Responsible for hotline support and train end-users on all company’s software products, • On-site support, installation and training at end-user office, • Trouble shooting of current software and new software, • Assisting sales and software staff on any sales or software activities if necessary, • Candidate with implementation of software projects will be an added advantage, • Any job functions to help the company function as a team that assigns to you.  Requirements: • Degree IT/Computer Science/PR/Marketing/Communication or equivalent. • Local Fresh Polytechnics graduates are encourage to apply. • Exposure to payroll, Human Resource and WEB knowledge will be an added asset. • Excellent communication and presentation skills. • Patient, polite, friendly and helpful personality. • Positive attitude, dynamic, resourceful and independent. • Must have interest in Software and IT industry. • Good PC ; Web Skills, knowledge in Windows, Windows XP-Pro, Win NT/2000/2003 ; above. • Familiar with MS Office and Windows software

jobs.jobTitle: Software Application Support Executive(Inventory Management and Accounting Software co)
jobs.description: Our client: A 2 decades old profitable and dynamic industry pioneer, specialised in inventory and accounting software for diverse industries. Job scope: (1)Troubleshoot software application issues on a virtual server, windows server n  desktop (2)To set up ,maintain, provide end user with technical support  of accounting and inventory software   Requirements: -Diploma up in Information Technology or networking -Experience with setup ; maintenance of windows servers, virtual machines (HyperV, Citrix), remote desktop, Fortinet firewall -Possess Experience in implementation ; technical support of accounting or inventory software and accounting knowledge will be an added advantage Work Location: Eunos Please submit resumes to michelle@careersg.sg with the following details in MS Word format: - Position applying for - Current remuneration - Expected remuneration - Notice period Michelle Goh EA License No : 22C1142 We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Thales Singapore Engineering Competence Centre (ECC) is a well-established R;D and engineering centre serving major customers worldwide in Digital Identity and Security domains ranging from mobile connectivity, IoT, banking ; payment to government solutions.  As a Software Engineer in Thales Embedded Product Development Team in ECC, you will participate in the design, implementation, validation and deployment of Embedded Products for major OEM customers.  A week in the life of an Embedded Software Engineer:    Develop, validate and deploy new software components (for example advance software security mechanism and next generation IoT connectivity protocols) for embedded operating systems targeted for mobile and IoT devices, in applications such as mobile payment, digital identity and IoT connectivity   Participate to the development of next generation operating systems for future devices   Being in agile development environment to work closely within team and multiple teams around the world to build great products exceeding customer expectations   Contribute to continuous product and development methodology improvement  Knowledge, Skills and Experience:    Degree in Electrical/Electronics/Computer Engineering, or related fields   Proficient in C/Java programming languages   First professional experience or internship within embedded software development area preferred   Knowledge of embedded technologies/ecosystem, software security or Javacard knowledge is a plus   Team player with good communications and collaborative skills
